Omicron has same hospital morality as Delta (THIS IS LIKELY WRONG).
Omicron is less severe than wildtype.
Omicron has shorter length of stay than wildtype.
Omicron has shorter incubation period than wildtype.
Omicron has shorter infectious period than wildtype.
less symptomatic compared to delta
even less symptomatic compared to delta if vaccinated
less hosp than delta

Adjust Omicron Seed
Adjust the seed for BA.2 so that we can reach 75% BA.2 by late-March.
Adjust the seed for BA.2.12.1 so that we can reach 25% BA.2 by late-April.
Booster immunity decays more slowly than 2-dose immunity.
Base maximum immunity from vaccines or prior infection.
Base minimum immunity from vaccines or prior infection.
No immunity for vaccine fails.
Delta reduces minimum vaccine immunity.
Omicron variants reduce maximum prior infection immunity from other types.
Omicron variants reduce minimum immunity.
Omicron BA2 variants reduce maximum immunity from Omicron infection.
Omicron BA2 variants reduce minimum immunity from Omicron infection.
BA121 reduces maximum immunity from BA2.
BA121 reduces minimum immunity from BA2.
Omicron reduces minimum vaccine immunity, but less so with a booster.
Vaccinated immunity vs severe disease is very high (among vacc. successes).
Prior infection immunity vs severe disease is much weaker.
Delta and Omicron reduce immunity to severe disease.
